attributes.action: Raise the minimum wage for 16-18 year olds to at least £4
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: We want the minimum wage to increase to at least £4 as i do not get EMA and my parents dont fund me the £30 a week i need a sorce of income and because jobs are very limited my work times are very short therefore i wish to see a pay rise over £4 as this will help me and many other 16-18 year olds pay towards our study resources. i am 16 and have seen many other students who dont EMA scraping paint off walls for a minimum wage of pennies. I and all other 16-18 year olds want a minimumWage Increase to help towards our education!!

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
